resumen:
About us
Hexagon is a global leader in sensor, software and autonomous solutions. We are putting data to work to boost efficiency, productivity, and quality across industrial, manufacturing, infrastructure, safety, and mobility applications.

Hexagon’s Agriculture division provides technologies that convert data into intelligent information that enables smart planning, efficient execution, precise machine controls and automated workflows that optimise operations and increase profits.

Our technologies are shaping urban and production ecosystems to become increasingly connected and autonomous — ensuring a scalable, sustainable future.

Hexagon (Nasdaq Stockholm: HEXA B) has approximately 22,000 employees in 50 countries and net sales of approximately 4.3bn Euro.

Our History
Hexagon's Agriculture division was formed, with unprecedented expertise in converting data into intelligent information, promoting true digital transformation in the field.

In 2015, Hexagon brought together three leaders in innovation and solutions for agroindustry — Arvus Tecnologia, ILab Sistemas and the agriculture business of Leica Geosystems. Exploring the technologies developed by these organisations, Hexagon saw the huge potential in automating operations and increasing productivity in agriculture throughout the world. This potential was realised through the unique combination of hardware, software and know-how provided by the trailblazers that would become the foundation of Hexagon’s Agriculture division.

Magnolia is a content platform that serves as a DXP and a headless CMS.

Founded in 1997 with a vision to create the first truly open content management system, today Magnolia is the fastest way to launch digital experiences.

Our founding goal was to make it easier for companies to build websites and create digital experiences on their terms. That meant giving them the tools to build around their own technical infrastructure - without having to rely on IT. Our mission has evolved but helping clients move fast and stay flexible is still our driving force.

Our content platform combines the functionality of an enterprise DXP suite with the flexibility of an API-first headless solution - in short, we deliver scalability at speed. Magnolia lets you bring together content, data, and services seamlessly in any tech stack, making it easy to orchestrate and deliver great digital experiences across channels in an agile way.

Iconic brands like Atlassian and The New York Times, a new wave of companies in industries ranging from automotive to telecommunications have made Magnolia their DXP of choice.

We operate globally with offices on five continents and more than 200 Magnolia-certified partners around the world.

resumen:
We are connecting online shopping with physical stores.

Seamless omnichannel experience through our BOPIS solution. Seeplus creates a bridge between the online and offline shopping journey through one solution, easily integrated and completely personalized.

Around 73% of retailers struggle with proper staff planning, which affects their overall customer experience, in-store efficiency, and order fulfillment process. At the same time, 36% of customers complain about long waits when picking up their orders.

Our end-to-end BOPIS solution can support and improve your retail journey in the following areas:
Planning - Scale your in-store efficiency through data-driven KPIs by effectively planning tasks, seamless internal comms, and organizing employee schedules
Order & execution - Easily execute multiple customer orders by providing instant messaging communication throughout the entire click & collect process.
Personalization - The ability to utilize personalized customer insight to generate upsell and cross-sell opportunities.
Feedback & KPIs - Use customer feedback to take immediate action, improve the overall shopping experience, and ultimately use gamification and incentives to enhance staff performance.

We are a retail innovation company focused on helping retailers to deliver a seamless, personalized omnichannel experience to their customers.
Together with retailers, we designed a unique data-driven modular solution to empower retail staff with actionable insights to drive better customer engagement and increase efficiency along the entire retail chain.
Inovretail is backed by a highly experienced, highly motivated team, with more than 40 years’ retail experience, having worked in different geographies at Tier 1 and Tier 2 Retailers.
Our team of experts and our solutions offer a highly differentiated approach to Data Science, delivering innovative and fully integrated solution on an everyday changing world.

resumen:
La actividad ENVIRONMENT de LACROIX engloba las ofertas de productos SOFREL destinados a los mercados de Smart Water y Smart HVAC, así como productos SAE destinados a los mercados de Smart Grids.
En Francia desde hace más de 40 años, y en España desde hace más de 20 años, SOFREL, ofrece soluciones conectadas para el control y la gestión a distancia de sistemas de agua potable, saneamiento,  instalaciones de calor y frío, climatización,…). Capaces de comunicar a distancia en cualquier tipo de soporte de (redes 2G, 3G, 4G, Radio, ADSL, Ethernet, etc.) los productos de telegestión SOFREL se adaptan fácilmente a todos los casos de uso y tipos de instalaciones a controlar (pozos, estaciones de bombeo, depósitos, estaciones de tratamiento de agua potable o residual, salas de calderas, subestaciones de redes de calor, ...
En Alemania, desde hace más de 30 años, los productos SAE están reconocidos para su aplicación en la monitorización y control remoto de redes de energía tradicionales y renovables, así como para servicios industriales y de gas. Desde subestaciones de control de distribución eléctrica, parques solares o parques eólicos, hasta el software de supervisión de redes, los equipos de telecontrol SAE permiten garantizar la optimización y seguridad de la producción de energía eléctrica.
Para acompañar a sus ofertas de productos conectados a SOFREL y SAE, la actividad LACROIX Environment también ofrece una amplia gama de servicios a sus clientes: estudios de proyectos, formación, asistencia en la instalación y puesta en marcha, hotline, servicio postventa, etc.
Implantada en Francia, Alemania, España, Italia y Singapur, la actividad de LACROIX Environment también está representada en más de 40 países a través de su red de partners certificados.
Filial del grupo industrial LACROIX (4.000 personas y 480 M€ de facturación), la actividad Environment y sus marcas SOFREL y SAE aportan la garantía de soluciones conectadas e innovadoras al servicio del Smart Environment.

resumen:
Channel Factory is a global technology and data platform that maximizes both performance efficiency and contextual suitability, delivering contextual performance for advertisers on YouTube. Channel Factory’s technology platform, ViewIQ, analyzes all YouTube channels and videos to ensure ads run on brand suitable and contextually relevant content. Channel Factory maximizes performance for advertisers on YouTube through managed service or self-service dynamic whitelists & blacklists, easily implemented through DV360 or Google Ads. Our platform is built to meet the needs of advertisers, offering standard IAB category lists or highly customized content lists in 36+ languages. 

Why Contextual Suitability? In our reviews of campaigns run outside of Channel Factory, we see on average 28% of an advertiser's campaign run against unsuitable videos, such as children’s content or against the wrong language. 

Leveraging historical performance data is a key differentiator for Channel Factory. We do not just ‘set it and forget it’ when it comes to contextual suitability. We incorporate active and historical campaign data into our ViewIQ platform and constantly optimize throughout the campaign, resulting in 30% efficiency in media spend.

resumen:
WALLIX Group is a cybersecurity company dedicated to defending and facilitating organizations’ success against cyber threats through industry-leading Identity and Access Security solutions. For over a decade, WALLIX has striven to protect companies' most critical IT and strategic assets against data breaches, making it the European leader in Privileged Access Management. WALLIX named a leader in the 2022 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Privileged Access Management.

As the Digital Transformation impacts companies’ IT security and data integrity worldwide, it poses an even greater challenge when data is highly sensitive. Recent regulatory changes in Europe (NIS, GDPR) and in the United States (NERC CIP, Cyber Security Directorate) urge companies to place cybersecurity at the heart of their activity.

In response to these challenges, WALLIX accompanies more than 1900 companies worldwide in sectors including Manufacturing, Finance, Healthcare, and Public services in conforming with regulations and protecting identities, access, and data across their entire organizations. As a leader in PAM, major players trust WALLIX to secure access to their data: Danagas, Dassault Aviation, Gulf Air, Maroc Telecom, McDonald’s, and Michelin are among them.

WALLIX partners with a trained and certified network of global resellers and distributors that help guarantee effective deployment and user adoption. 

WALLIX is the first European cybersecurity software editor to be publicly traded and can be found on EuroNext under the code ALLIX. 

WALLIX is the founding member of Hexatrust. 

WALLIX PAM4ALL was the first government-certified solution on the French market and is now recognized as the best PAM Solution on the global market by the US Analyst Firm Frost & Sullivan.

Pallet pooling is the way to ensure efficient and sustainable supply chains across Europe. Every day LPR develops and delivers smart, hassle free & data-driven solutions that really fit customers’ changing needs, FMCG and retailers. At LPR we are committed to maximize circular value for and with our customers and partners. 

With a network of 129 service centres and over 28,000 customer drop-points in 15 countries, LPR leads the way across Europe. More than 325 employees managed our pallets everyday leading to a global turnover of 258M€ for 2020.

LPR is a division of Europool Group. To discover the benefits of our Red Pallets, visit www.lpr.eu

resumen:
TradeTracker.com pone a tu disposición lo mejor de la comunidad online para que consigas los mejores resultados en tu campaña de afiliación.

Nuestra plataforma te ofrece la mayor transparencia informativa, mostrándote todos los datos de forma completa y precisa, en tiempo real y en un formato de fácil comprensión y manejo, para que puedas tomar las decisiones más adecuadas y efectivas para tu campaña. 

Actualmente contamos con oficinas en 18 países y más de 180 empleados a nivel mundial, con la más amplia cobertura y presencia en numerosos mercados. Prestamos servicio en múltiples idiomas y localizaciones, aportando a los usuarios una experiencia fluida a nivel internacional.

Algunas de los elementos que nos diferencian: 
• Admonitor: La herramienta que protege tu marca del tráfico fraudulento y abusivo en los buscadores. ¡Diseñada por TradeTracker!

• Ruta de conversión: descubre el trayecto que realizan tus clientes y optimízala para generar incluso mejores resultados. 

• Interfaz intuitiva: en tu cuenta encontrarás un panel claro y comprensible que te recibirá con datos actualizados cada vez que entres, convirtiendo la interpretación de los datos y la formulación de estrategias de campaña en una tarea fácil y efectiva. 

• Account Managers Específicos por Sectores: nuestros Account Managers están especializados en tu sector para aportarte la experiencia y conocimiento que facilitarán el éxito de tu campaña.

¡Contáctanos y descubre todas las ventajas que TradeTracker puede aportar a tu negocio!

resumen:
LEMKEN ist weltweit als visionäres und nachhaltig arbeitendes Unternehmen angesehen, das einen wichtigen Beitrag zu einer profitablen Landwirtschaft leistet. Als mittelständischer Familienbetrieb setzt LEMKEN seit 241 Jahren sein Wissen und seine Leidenschaft für den Fortschritt ein und liefert Lösungen für die landwirtschaftlichen Herausforderungen von heute und morgen. Im Angebot sind Bodenbearbeitungsgeräte, Sämaschinen, Hackmaschinen, Düngerstreuer sowie smarte Lösungen für das landwirtschaftliche Datenmanagement. Aktuell erwirtschaftet LEMKEN mit weltweit 1.600 Mitarbeiterinnen und Mitarbeitern einen Umsatz von rund 400 Mio. €.
Mit ihrem Wissen und ihrem Engagement legen die Mitarbeiter in Deutschland und 26 internationalen Tochtergesellschaften den Grundstein dafür, dass Landwirte weltweit profitabel arbeiten können. Dafür haben wir ein sicheres Arbeitsumfeld geschaffen, das Möglichkeiten bietet, sich weiterzuentwickeln und an der erfolgreichen Zukunft des Unternehmens mitzuwirken.
In engem Austausch mit Landwirten entwickelt, ist Landtechnik von LEMKEN nicht nur innovativ und vielseitig, sondern auch praxisgerecht. Wir bieten individuelle Lösungen für jede Betriebsgröße, jeden Boden, jeden Markt und jeden Anspruch.
tamaño_empresa: 1001-5000 empleados

Remotely managed, Ecoppia's platform allows utility-scale solar sites to achieve optimal performance with minimal human intervention and lower LCOE. 
Ecoppia’s proprietary algorithms and robotic solutions make day-to-day O&M at solar sites safer, more efficient and more reliable.

Our clients enjoy the benefits of a cloud-based, data-driven platform, allowing them to reach their full potential while ensuring their constant growth and scalability.

Publicly held and backed by prominent international investment funds, Ecoppia provides revolutionized solar ROIs for leading Tier1 energy conglomerates worldwide, cleaning millions of solar panels every month.

resumen:
FWU is a specialized unit-linked life insurance and financial service provider whose offering spans from highly efficient IT-systems and big data investment solutions to commission-factoring and refinancing expertise. FWU provides tailor-made solutions for distributors to satisfy the end customer.

Being headquartered in Munich, FWU services 12 offices reaching from Kuala Lumpur to Madrid and consists of 23 entities. Among these are two life insurance companies FWU Life Lux and FWU Life Austria based in Luxemburg and Vienna, the asset management company FWU Invest in Luxemburg, and FWU Takaful, which operates from DIFC, Dubai.

In 1983, Dr. Manfred Dirrheimer founded FWU as "Forschungsgesellschaft für Wettbewerb- und Unternehmensorganisation", laying the foundation for a success story of more than 30 years. FWU has grown from a Munich-based consultancy firm to a product innovator in the life insurance market and ultimately to a global player in the life insurance business. FWU acts independently and focusses it's company strategy on rapid yet sustainable growth, just as family businesses should.
especialidad: Takaful, Unit-linked Life Insurance, Shariah Compliant Investments y Investment Management

uSizy Size Adviser
With only 2 lines of code to integrate, uSizy Size Adviser recommends the exact size for apparel and footwear to online shoppers. With this personalized, user-friendly experience, uSizy clients see on average a 20% boost in conversion, a 25% drop in returns and a 3% jump in customer loyalty from day 1.

Smart Stock 
Manage your stock supply more effectively by preventing and improving stock breakage, drawing from on demand Big data and conversion rate for each product and size

Smart Pricing
Adjust pricing for each size, product, and category and gain an improved margin from predictions on conversion rate and demand for each price according to size

Smart Logistics
Plan stock and transportation logistics more efficiently by anticipating products and sizes with a high probability of return

Services like Smart Stock, Smart Pricing and Smart Logistics drive profitability through identifying and prioritizing high-margin activities, optimizing logistics and returns processes, and eliminating costs.

uSizy is not only a provider, but a partner in achieving immediate results along with continuous improvement. Are you ready to take your business up a size?

Getting started is easy. Contact us today at hello@usizy.com!

resumen:
KERB is a parking platform that provides services to both the supply-side and the demand-side of the parking marketplace - for any vehicle, anywhere. 

For Drivers, KERB is a customer-facing (B2C) app that helps you find, book, pay for and access parking for any vehicle, in any city around the world. KERB is improving the parking experience for drivers and owners of cars, motorbikes, trucks, buses, boats and private jets.

For Car Park Owners and Operators, KERB is a (B2B) software platform that turns any parking facility into a 21st-Century digital, hands-free, personalised parking experience - at almost zero cost. KERB works inside or alongside a building's existing car park infrastructure while reducing CAPEX/OPEX costs.

KERB’s vision is to simplify parking for any type of vehicle, in any type of parking space, by leveraging smart technology and data. KERB’s vision, once realised, will deliver dramatic improvements to vehicular mobility, to a more sustainable urban environment, and to the lifestyle of citizens in the world’s major cities.

Product
Over 900 customers strengthen their EHSQ and ESG management with Quentic software solutions. With ten individually combinable modules, our online platform includes Health & Safety, Risks & Audits, Incidents & Observations, Hazardous Chemicals, Control of Work, Legal Compliance, Online Instructions, Processes, Environmental Management and Sustainability. It is officially confirmed that Quentic is designed to support management systems according to ISO 14001, ISO 50001, and ISO 45001. Our web-based solution unifies data, connects all EHSQ and ESG stakeholders in a single system, and drives customers’ success – via browser or app. As tasks interlock across departments, locations, and even countries, Quentic enables businesses to efficiently control their processes according to legal requirements. 

Company
We are one of the leading solution providers of Software as a Service in the European EHSQ and ESG market. Our mission is to connect, engage, and inspire all EHSQ and sustainability stakeholders. We are headquartered in Berlin, Germany, and employ more than 250 people. Subsidiaries are located in eleven European countries.

Culture 
Our corporate culture is full of enthusiasm. We’re proud to do work that makes meaningful contributions to people, society, and the environment. We bring clarity to complex issues and guide our customers through increasingly stringent legal requirements. We are only satisfied when our customers can optimize their EHSQ and ESG management in the best possible way. Find out more about our mission statement: www.quentic.com/company/mission-statement

resumen:
Dass modernes Finanzdaten-Management auch leicht sein kann, beweisen wir Tag für Tag. Seit 1999 schaffen wir für Sie immer wieder das Besondere: Nutzerfreundliche Softwarelösungen für Financial Performance Management, die Sie durch automatisierte Abläufe entlasten. Die Ihre Finanzdaten transparent in einem Tool abbilden. Die Ihnen fundierte Zahlen für alle unternehmensrelevanten Entscheidungen liefern. Und bei Fragen stehen wir Ihnen mit unserer fachlichen Expertise beratend zur Seite.

Wir stehen für mehr als das Versprechen, Abschluss, Finanzplanung, Reporting und Datenmanagement zu vereinfachen. Unser Antrieb ist es, stets die intelligentesten Lösungen zu finden. Von Finanzexperten für Finanzexperten. Immer auf Augenhöhe. Dafür stellen wir uns konsequent auf den Prüfstand und hinterfragen das Bewährte. Wir entwickeln keine Anwendungen, sondern schaffen User-Experience. Und erzählen dabei die ganze Geschichte Ihrer Finanzen – damit Sie Ihr Unternehmen erfolgreich in die Zukunft steuern.

Konsolidierung, Planung, Reporting und Datenmanagement kennen keine Grenzen. Wir auch nicht. LucaNet ist überall dort, wo Finanzteams verlässliche Zahlen benötigen. Unser Herz schlägt in Berlin. Zusammen mit unseren nationalen und internationalen Standorten und unseren Partnern bilden wir ein weltweit umspannendes Netzwerk. Immer nah am Kunden. Unsere Art, Finance neu zu denken, hat uns weit gebracht. Mehr als 3.500 Unternehmen in über 50 Länder vertrauen auf LucaNet. Denn wenn Finance einfach wird, haben Sie mehr Zeit für das Wesentliche.

resumen:
Worldpanel by Kantar
Experts in understanding global shopper and consumer behaviour, to inspire brand growth. We provide continuous shopper monitoring and advanced analytics to inform your retail and marketing strategies, enabling you to make smarter decisions, to shape a better world for consumers.

About us 
As part of Kantar, the world’s leading marketing data and analytics company, Worldpanel provides brands and retailers with a unique, 360-degree understanding of consumer behaviour across the globe.
We are shopper-centric, continuously monitoring the purchase and usage behaviour through the largest omnipanel in the world. With unparalleled datasets, pioneering technology and expert analysts, we partner with brands and retailers of all sizes, empowering them to reimagine what’s possible, and change the landscape to create a better, healthier, more sustainable and inclusive world.
This extensive breadth and depth of data is delivered by MyWorldpanel, a cloud-based platform, currently deploying worldwide, to provide the most intuitive and efficient way to analyse the data and simulate scenarios, uncovering behavioural truths at the speed of life.
Our vertical expertise includes consumer goods, retail, ecommerce, foodservice, beauty, home, fashion, footwear, media and entertainment, mobile, home appliances, books, home improvement, toys and gift cards. 
We deliver a holistic market measurement, giving brands and retailers the power to spot emerging trends and respond quickly to changing behaviour. 
Kantar Worldpanel – Understand people, inspire growth.

About Kantar
Kantar is the world’s leading marketing data and analytics company. We have a complete, unique and rounded understanding of how people think, feel and act; globally and locally in over 90 markets. By combining the deep expertise of our people, our data resources and benchmarks, and our innovative analytics and technology, we help our clients understand people and inspire growth.

Diehl Metering is a worldwide leader in the design, manufacture and supply of smart metering solutions. With over 150 years of experience, we empower utilities, municipalities and industries to take control of their infrastructures, bringing greater efficiency, sustainability and responsibility to the way they manage water and energy.

Our extensive range of services and solutions includes data-driven insights, IoT connectivity, fully-flexible software, and seamless intelligent metering. We have pioneered several new technologies in the metering sector, and continue to develop innovations in digitalization and artificial intelligence. Our entire portfolio is founded on creating enduring value and building lasting relationships with our customers.

Headquartered in Germany, we are a family-owned business with an international reach. We are proud to maintain our founding principles of quality, reliability and customer proximity, proactively shaping a better future for our customers and the communities they serve. Our approach is to think global and act local. By anticipating trends and remaining agile, we adapt and develop our strategy with our customers and for them.

In supporting their long-term growth, we also contribute to the sustainability of the planet, crafting innovations that enable our customers to make ever better use of the natural resources we all rely on.

resumen:
SUPPLY CHAINS SIMPLIFIED WITH LOGISTICS AS A SERVICE

KlearNow is transforming supply chains with its smart Logistics as a Service (LaaS) platform that connects data, people, processes, and organizations to enable new levels of visibility and productivity that reduce logistics costs and create better customer experiences. KlearNow’s customs clearance and drayage marketplaces on its AI-powered platform ease supply chain bottlenecks by digitizing paper-based transactions and enabling customs brokers and transporters to deliver superior real-time visibility needs of importers, exporters, and freight forwarders. 

The company is headquartered in the heart of Silicon Valley - Santa Clara, California - with an offshore development and support office in Gurugram, India. To better serve global trade, we expanded into Canada and UK, with plans to expand into other countries next year.

Key executives and co-founders include Sam Tyagi, a successful serial entrepreneur (currently the CEO and Chairman of KlearNow), Ulf Sandberg, veteran technology executive, and Rick Tellez, a 20+ year experienced logistics and supply chain expert.  

We are currently expanding and looking to hire superstars. Come join us!

resumen:
VoxSmart helps businesses see their communications data in a clear and compliant way to effectively mitigate business risks by delivering critical insights and business intelligence in near real-time. FLUZO is a Cross Media Measurement Service for agencies, media (TV/radio/streaming), research institutes and advertisers. We offer real time data for audience measurement and advertising efficiency research.
 
In partnership with some of the main panel companies in the world, we have created the first single source measurement model for all media: TV, radio, online audio/video, display, outdoor and print. The data is collected passively, through the same user base and with a unique cross-device methodology for both linear and on-demand audiovisual content. 

FLUZO provides a white-label Automatic Content Recognition (ACR) technology that can be easily integrated into any mobile app. Our partners and customers use it to measure the consumer´s audiovisual context (what content they are watching; which ads they are exposed to) regardless of the content-emitting device.
 
Thanks to FLUZO, ground-breaking custom research using high quality audience data is now achievable. Our technology enables you to produce innovative and highly demanded analytics for any kind of cross-media research: from advertising efficiency to cross-media content consumption and behavioral changes based on content/advertising exposure.

La Asociación Española de Programadores Informáticos es una asociación de ámbito y presencia nacional inscrita en el registro nacional de asociaciones con número de CIF G86732062, formada por y para los programadores, nos gusta lo que hacemos, estamos motivados y estamos comprometidos.

AEPI nació en 2006 con la intención de cambiar el sector de la tecnología en España y en concreto el sector del software, porque pensamos que las cosas se pueden hacer mejor. En estos años de vida nos hemos especializado en formar a particulares y empresas en distintas tecnologías con precios asequibles para que todo el mundo pueda permitirse aprender a programar, para ello ideamos un sistema propio de enseñanza para transmitir el oficio de programador. Nuestro segundo pilar de actuación es y será la incorporación laboral de nuestros alumnos, para ello contamos con una amplia bolsa de empleo y un portal de empleo propio.

¿Nuestras cifras? Más de 1000 alumnos al año formados con garantía, más de 50 micro proyectos de software anuales para nuestros alumnos y más de 500 personas al año que han tenido una oportunidad laboral de nuestra mano.

Nuestros pilares de actuación son los siguientes:

Departamento de formación: Formación a particulares utilizando nuestro sistema “Persona a Persona”, formación a empresas de manera personalizada.

Departamento de desarrollo de software: Proyectos de desarrollo de software y páginas Web para que nuestros alumnos tengan una primera toma de contacto con el mundo laboral, ganen experiencia, aumenten su curriculum y portafolio profesional y puedan afrontar con garantías la búsqueda activa de empleo.

Departamento laboral: Contamos con bolsa de empleo y portal de empleo propio del sector TIC y nuevas tecnologías.
Programa de certificaciones: Contamos con un programa de certificaciones propio para que cualquier persona que lo desee pueda presentarse a examen y obtener una nueva cualificación profesional de cara al exigente mercado laboral.

resumen:
Nautilus: Tecnología inalámbrica de flotabilidad neutra para la detección de fugas de agua en tuberías de gran diámetro 

Nautilus consiste en una esfera que viaja en el interior de la tubería impulsada por el caudal del agua. El sonido de una fuga, bolsa de aire o anomalía es grabado por Nautilus y, una vez extraído, los datos se procesan y se indica la localización precisa de las anomalías. 

El Sistema se usa para la detección de fugas, inspección de la red y prevención de fugas. Las compañías de agua obtienen información significativa sobre sus tuberías y enfocan sus acciones para disminuir la inversión en el mantenimiento de sus infraestructuras.

Nautilus provee una solución tecnológica rentable, eficiente y eficaz, con un modelo de uso recurrente que ayuda a minimizar el Agua No Contabilizada en el Mundo.

resumen:
World-class, award-winning agency running UA with influencers. 
🌲Planting 1 tree for every 1 video we work in 🌎

💻 Join TATAM >> 📧 Apply here: https://forms.gle/eRmfLTECoyxaLvYy8

Clients:
Babbel, Blinkist, HelloFresh, Scentbird, MyHeritage, Harrys, Trainline, and many more.

Overall 2021 achievements:
- 3500 influencers
- 4359 sponsorships
- 454M views
- 77 NPS
- Campaigns in 17 markets, 9 languages.
- Youtube, IG, Tiktok, Twitch, Clubhouse and Podcasts.

Performance 
Saying we are obsessed with performance is a bit of an understatement. We want to see our clients succeed, above all else. We track each deal’s performance on the main KPIs that our clients need: CPM, CPI, CPL, CAC, LTV & ROAS.

Proprietary tools
In the same way that every user search makes the Google algorithm better and smarter, every new client and sponsored video makes us a better performance agency.
We do this by 
 1) giving each influencer a unique campaign link, 
 2) measuring everything that happens when users click on the links, and 
 3) centralizing all campaign data in a BI solution that helps us run advanced analytics and visualizations.

A result of these unique data collection and analytics efforts is TATAM.tools, a proprietary influencer tools stack, announced and launched in late 2021

Knowledge sharing
We define ourselves as a knowledge company. Not just because it helps us and our clients—it elevates everyone in the industry.
Our papers available for free at www.tatam.digital/papers

Nuestro amplio conocimiento cruzado de múltiples tecnologías y soluciones de software genera máximo valor añadido para aquellas organizaciones que buscan optimizar los procesos existentes o acometer su transformación digital. Ofrecemos nuestros servicios en sectores de alta exigencia como banca y seguros.

Agilizamos operativas y garantizamos ahorro de costes y tiempo. Somos expertos en aceleración de procesos de cálculo y HPC, de modo que logramos reducir el tiempo de los algoritmos, procesos batch, bases de datos, back-ends y otros sistemas. Ofrecemos soluciones completas relacionadas con Cloud, Big Data, plataformas de datos, arquitecturas avanzadas, Grid Computing, AI, Blockchain y microservicios, entre otros.

El expertise que hemos acumulado a lo largo de nuestra historia nos permite ofrecer los proyectos que mejor se adaptan a las necesidades de nuestros clientes. El equipo humano que conforma Vermont Solutions está compuesto por perfiles técnicos apasionados por las nuevas tecnologías e interesados en asumir retos en un ambiente de constante crecimiento.

Apostamos por el talento a largo plazo, porque queremos que los grandes profesionales encuentren en Vermont Solutions un lugar en el que querer estar y del que se sientan orgullosos. Brindamos múltiples beneficios sociales para asegurar el bienestar, la conciliación y la salud laboral de las personas. Nuestro objetivo es ofrecer planes de carrera con formaciones certificadas, con un soporte continuo del resto del grupo.

Tanto si buscas iniciar tu carrera profesional como si quieres darle un nuevo impulso a tu trayectoria, en Vermont Solutions estaremos encantados de conocerte.
especialidad: Consultoría, HPC, Big Data, Software, Consultoría IT, Desarrollo de Software, Aceleración de procesos de cálculo, IT Consulting, Software Development, BI, artificial intelligence, Inteligencia artificial, AI, business intelligence, Bancos, Banks, Cloud y GreatPlaceToWork

IO Connect Services is a company specializing in Information Technology Consultancy Services. All our team members have one thing in common: our enthusiasm for technology and our passion for customer service excellence. We provide onshore and nearshore services in North America, Latin America, and Europe. Our headquarters are located in the NYC metropolitan area, and we also have offices in Guadalajara and Madrid, Spain.

Our Values:
- Trust: We work on establishing and maintaining trust with our clients and all business partners for long-term relationships.
- Lean Project Delivery: Our team focuses on understanding the needs and develop the requirements with our clients to well design, implement, verify, and deploy the right solution. Our goal is to build 100% usable software products without creating waste to stay within budget and time estimates.
- Global Readiness: We are a group of diverse multi-cultural individuals that use English as our corporate and business language. Our Software Engineers have their academic studies validated by educational organizations in the USA and qualifying TOEFL scores to ensure service excellence and flawless communication with our clients and business partners.
- Software Engineering Excellence: In IO Connect Services, we value the academic preparation of our members. Due to the nature of our work, we encourage our employees to continue with their formal and professional education by providing tuition support for graduate studies like Masters and Doctorates. We also cover training and certification expenses.
- Education is the key (not tools!)

resumen:
Fujitsu’s research activities play a crucial role in enabling Fujitsu’s digital transformation strategy, developing cutting-edge technologies that are helping to solve social challenges through innovation.

Our R&D focus is wide-ranging - from Artificial Intelligence (AI), Quantum-inspired computing and Cyber Security, to Social Digital Twin, Genomics and Ethical AI – realising the mission to conduct leading-edge technology research to make our purpose a reality: “to make the world more sustainable by building trust in society through innovation." Our trusted technologies are ethical, reliable, explainable and sustainable, aligned to the UN’s Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) to promote sustainability while protecting the planet.

Representing Fujitsu’s research activities in Europe, Fujitsu Research of Europe’s activities are spread between our UK HQ near Heathrow outside London, and our Data Analytics Centre in Madrid, employing some 50 staff including highly skilled data scientists and researchers. 

Fujitsu Research of Europe is regarded as one of the region’s research and development centres, with its wide range of R&D and co-creation activities focusing on cutting edge innovations that address real-world challenges, underpinned by ethical concepts.

Through open innovation, co-creation and collaboration, Fujitsu’s trailblazing technologies underpin the digital transformation process – working with customers and Fujitsu businesses to solve real-world problems in today’s digital society.

(Fujitsu Research of Europe was formerly known as Fujitsu Laboratories of Europe.)
especialidad: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Analytics, Internet of Things, Smart IoT research, Open Innovation, Digital Transformation, Deep Learning, Cyber Security, Ethics for AI, Information Analytics, Security Technology, blockchain, approximate computing y trusted technology

resumen:
MonoM's purpose is to convert all industrial companies into fully digital industries, both their assets and infrastructure, as well as their processes. We convert analog industries into cloud industries.

How do we do it?

Our services and solutions are based on a multipurpose Industrial IoT platform that can manage any OT and IT data of an industrial company. This allows us not only to manage and improve processes, but also to control and monitor assets and infrastructures. Allowing predictive management of these, and their maintenance. 
Our approach to any project means that we can help the customer both in the selection of IoT hardware and its management. Also, in the parameterization and/or customization of data, dashboards, alarms, graphics, digital twins, information levels and others that the customer needs for the digitized management of its assets, infrastructure, and processes. 

Who does it?

We are continuously developing our knowledge in data technologies and that makes us have a compendium of experienced collaborators in data science, artificial intelligence, big data, cloud, augmented reality, IoT and others, which allows us to evolve and adapt the IoT platform to industry needs. Accompanied by others who have the knowledge and experience in the needs of the industry and its assets, which means that we also have on staff experts in quality processes, in assets such as engines, turbines, pressure groups, wind turbines, and many others and in vision technologies, sensors, auscultation, digitization and others. 

Why do we do it?

As part of the Grupo Álava, we have been helping and advising all types of industries in their improvement and evolution processes for half a century, supplying hardware, solutions and service. We believe that it is possible to make all industrial sectors more efficient, productive, and socially and environmentally responsible, if we turn them into 100% digitized industries managed from cloud environments.
tamaño_empresa: 11-50 empleados

resumen:
Who we are. knoell USA offers regulatory solutions for worldwide registration of chemicals and agricultural products. Our vision is to be the trusted industry leader in worldwide regulatory solutions.

What we do. knoell USA provides end-to-end regulatory consultation services. Our mission is to deliver superior regulatory solutions with flexibility and outstanding customer service.

What markets do we serve? Regulatory solutions for agriculture: pesticides, bio-stimulants, fertilizers and antimicrobials. Regulatory solutions for chemicals: workplace & consumer products, food contact materials and polymers. We provide strategic consultancy, registration, data gap analysis, toxicology & risk assessment, technical writing, quality assurance, product stewardship, SDS authoring, TSCA & FIFRA compliance, and more.

Where are we located? Headquartered in Garnet Valley, PA., with a second location in Research Triangle Park, NC. We are a subsidiary of the knoell group with 19 locations worldwide serving the global regulatory market.

What is our experience? We have over 20 successful years of experience. We draw expertise and experience from over 600 regulatory and technical experts worldwide.
Who are our clients? Global giants, Fortune 500, mid-sized companies, and start-ups. Our clients vary from having large regulatory staffing to no regulatory support.

What is our approach? We provide the correct regulatory pathways to meet global, national and state obligations. We save you time, money, and effort, tailoring services to meet needs, providing support to best fit the scope of the work.

What is the knoell USA benefit? We ask for, then listen to client needs to solve their problems. We think globally and act locally. Working with a single regulatory partner to address your global needs ensures your data are always secure, and your business is held in confidence. Our proactive approach solves regulatory concerns and roadblocks efficiently, before they become obstacles.
especialidad: Registrations, Product chemistry, SDS, labeling, GHS, Structure elucidation, OSHA HAZCOM, REACH, TSCA, FIFRA, Quality assurance, Bee exposure analysis and writing, Environmental fate & modeling, Agricultural products, Food Contact Materials, Polymers, Toxicology & Risk Assessment, Technical Writing, Pesticides & Fertilizers, Data Gap Analysis, Product Stewardship, TSCA Training, Biostimulants, Strategic Regulatory Consulting y Global, National & State Regulatory Experts

resumen:
The Spectos Group, headquartered in Dresden, Germany, is an international company specialized in monitoring and improving service quality in service-oriented industries.

Through the Spectos Service Quality Cloud, Spectos supports customers worldwide with customized solutions in the areas of customer service, quality management, employee management and operations in the development, control and optimization of their service quality. Spectos expert teams enable companies to collect and analyze targeted, high-quality data in real time and make it available for the daily improvement of service processes in online cockpits and apps at the touch of a button. This is achieved with a lean, flexible and agile approach to collaboration.

Central element is the Spectos Real-Time Performance Management™ platform. Data and information from various sources are continuously combined, analyzed and visualized in customized cockpits and dashboards with easy-to-understand graphics and reports. Based on the results, immediate actions for immediate and long-term improvement of service quality can be derived via integrated ticket and alert functions.

The TÜV-certified solutions are widely used in the postal & logistics, healthcare, mobility, smart city, public administration and many other industries.

Since November 2018, Kizy Tracking SA has been the subsidiary of Spectos GmbH and has expanded the Spectos technology solution portfolio with real-time tracking services.

Spectos has been supporting leading companies with business performance improvement for more than 20 years. Our mission is to make data and information tangible for all organizations and thus close the gap between analysis and action, creating opportunities for growth and improvement on a daily basis.

Using state-of-the-art technologies, Spectos integrates the voice of the customer with operational data from ERP and CRM systems, as well as data gathered from real-time tracking, RFID systems and WiFi tracking.
sector: Servicios de TI y consultoría de TI

resumen:
Alcyon Photonics designs very high-performance photonic devices that can be transversally applied to integrated chips for a broad range of applications: optical communications, biochemical sensing, spectrometry through micro-satellites, etc. CDTI- Neotec awarded. Innovative SME awarded. Awarded High Innovation Intensity SME by Comunidad de Madrid with the support of the EU ERDF.
Our activity brings together innovation from Optics Institute of the Spanish Research Council (IO-CSIC), the Department of Communications Engineering of the University of Malaga (UMA) and own development. 
We already hold several patents on Photonic Building Block that can be easily integrated and deployed on larger electronic structures.
Alcyon Photonics has become a NEOTEC awarded company, which recognizes its contribution to bridge innovation and industrial development.

nombre: GRYDD Supply Chain & Logistics Operating System
resumen:
Grydd is a Supply Chain & Logistics Operating System (OS), that incorporates Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence, providing operating and predictive data consolidation and analytics. We integrate all the elements of global and local Supply Chains into one intuitive platform. Grydd is a true end to end collaborative operating systems designed for all the players in the Supply Chain (Shippers, Carriers and Logistics Operators). 

We understand that the power of Supply Chain stems from the people and the data generated by those relationships during the logistics process. Our platform is a collection of internal and external variables, algorithms and data that help build a predictable, intelligent, and efficient environment. By connecting the GRID through enhanced Collaboration, Business Intelligence, Artificial Intelligence and Process Management modules we elevate an old school industry without disrupting its essence.

resumen:
WIBU-SYSTEMS AG (WIBU®) fue fundada en 1989 por Oliver Winzenried y Marcellus Buchheit. Desde su debut Wibu-Systems ha revolucionado la escena internacional de las innovaciones tecnológicas de seguridad. La cartera de productos ofrece protección para activos digitales, propiedad intelectual y protección de la integridad contra la piratería, la ingeniería inversa y manipulación de código. 

La amplia, y galardonada, gama de soluciones Wibu-Systems es única y abarca campos de aplicación de ordenadores a móviles, desde la automatización embebida a la computación en nube, de SaaS a los modelos virtuales. 

A través de su lema "Perfection in Protection, Licensing and Security", Wibu-Systems ha permitido nuevos modelos de negocio: modelos con enfoque de software, ya sea para el ámbito de uso para consumidores, corporativo o sistemas embebidos, usted logrará obtener beneficios económicos de sus inversiones a través de esquemas de orquestación de licencia. 

Con sede en Karlsruhe, Alemania, Wibu-Systems posee filiales en Seattle, EE.UU., así como en Shanghái y Beijing, China, la compañía también tiene oficinas de ventas en Bélgica, Francia, Países Bajos, Portugal, España, el Reino Unido y una fuerte red de distribución mundial.
especialidad: software licensing, Internet of Things, Industrie 4.0, software protection, software security, embedded system, reverse engineering, software piracy, cyber-security, software monetization, LEM, copy protection, IP protection, entitlement management, secure boot, IoT, IIoT, encryption, cryptography y obfuscation

resumen:
BeDataScience es una plataforma cloud de inteligencia artificial destinada a mejorar los resultados de negocio gracias a la extracción, unificación y gestión de datos. La aplicación de la IA permite detectar oportunidades, anticiparse a posibles cambios y, por ende, incrementar los objetivos propuestos.

Combina aprendizaje automático, análisis predictivo, tecnología de normas de negocio, herramientas de simulación y visualización que permiten descubrir información, predecir resultados y generar recomendaciones.

Es una plataforma adaptable a empresas de cualquier sector y destinada a mejorar las oportunidades de negocio en departamentos de operaciones, marketing, ventas, servicio al cliente, recursos humanos y tecnología. Una información pensada para tomar mejores decisiones, incrementar las ventas, fidelizar la cartera de clientes y mejorar la productividad e implicación de los empleados.

Integrada por distintos módulos, el usuario parte de un Core de base que va creciendo a medida que aumentan sus necesidades. De tal manera que todos y cada uno de los módulos pueden operar tanto de forma independiente como combinada para un mejor aprovechamiento de los datos.

resumen:
SERFIEX S.A. es una empresa española especialista en soluciones de valoración de activos financieros y pasivos actuariales, risk-management y cumplimiento normativo para cuatro áreas financieras: aseguradoras, gestoras de inversiones, bolsas y bancos. Desde 1993. SERFIEX es una empresa Risktech, Insurtech, Regtech y Fintech.

SERFIEX licencia su software RISKCO y presta con él servicios de valor añadido a clientes institucionales. RISKCO combina conocimiento académico avanzado y 25 años de experiencia. La velocidad, versatilidad y funcionalidad de RISKCO es comparable a FIS-Prophet o WillisTowersWatson-RiskAgility para cálculos actuariales; y a Algorithmics o Aladdin para cálculos financieros.

Los precios actuales de RISKCO y de sus servicios asociados son muy inferiores a los de los líderes internacionales y nuestra calidad es excelente.

RISKCO está presente en cerca de 100 instituciones financieras. Más de 50 aseguradoras, más de 30 gestoras de inversiones, bancos y bolsas en España, Portugal, Colombia, México, Chile y Perú.

Hemos realizado proyectos de consultoría internacionales para el Banco Mundial (mercado de bonos corporativos en Tailandia), la Unión Europea (desarrollo del mercado de deuda pública en Ucrania) y Ministerio de Economía de Perú (gestión de deuda pública peruana).
 
Desde sus inicios SERFIEX siempre ha sido una compañía adelantada a su tiempo. Hemos desarrollado productos y conceptos nuevos:

SERFIEX fue uno de los mayores contribuidores internacionales a REUTERS y BLOOMBERG a finales de los 90: Índices Demi (los primeros índices de renta fija en el mundo “fair value” y en tiempo real), curvas cupón cero, matrices de riesgo previstas y predicciones de volatilidad.
SERFIEX desarrollo en 1999 uno de los primeros “robo-advisor” de la industria financiera internacional: con el nombre “Asesor Virtual”, para los bancos UNO-E y Activo Bank.
tamaño_empresa: 11-50 empleados

resumen:
Pepper Advantage es una empresa global de gestión de crédito que opera en nueve jurisdicciones del Reino Unido, Europa y Asia Pacífico. Tenemos cerca de 60 mil millones de dólares en activos bajo gestión y aportamos un enfoque único centrado en la tecnología y en la forma de administrar los activos crediticios en nombre de nuestros clientes. 

Al trabajar con activos inmobiliarios comerciales y residenciales, préstamos personales y para pymes, tarjetas de crédito, financiación de activos y punto de venta, siempre ponemos al cliente en el centro del proceso y adoptamos un enfoque holístico en todo lo que hacemos.  

Utilizamos datos y análisis en tiempo real para administrar los riesgos crediticios y permitir que nuestros clientes tomen decisiones más rápidas e inteligentes que los mantengan un paso adelante. Al hacerlo, creamos las mejores oportunidades para que todas las personas con las que nos relacionamos avancen positivamente. Nuestro objetivo es informar y guiar a nuestros clientes y sus clientes hacia el mejor resultado posible, independientemente del proceso financiero en el que se encuentren.  

Creada en 2012, Pepper Advantage ahora emplea a más de 1000 personas para atender a 65 clientes y mas de 1 millón de usuarios finales. A través de una fuerte inversión en tecnología y en análisis de datos, estamos impulsando la eficiencia operativa, potenciando y expandiendo nuestro cometido en todo el mundo. 

¿Nuestro objetivo? Ofrecer a las personas una ventaja para ayudarles a tener éxito.

resumen:
Anyverse is a scalable, cloud-based Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) platform that can quickly synthesize highly accurate 3D data—covering all potential scenarios and conditions—using a high-fidelity, physics-based simulation technology. This allows system developers to accelerate their testing-training cycles and build more complete and accurate models in much less time, with lower costs. 

ANYVERSE can reproduce in any possible scenario and conditions in 3D, creating images and video sequences to simulate output from the system’s sensor stack. This wealth of data allows perception developers to complete their crucial training-testing process faster and better, removing the bottleneck. 

ANYVERSE is focused on deep sensor simulation and advanced sensor features, to produce the highest-quality, most reliable data. ANYVERSE can give clients the power and flexibility to create arbitrary new scenarios and iterate on new training/testing cycles.

resumen:
Dental engineering company that have developed the best system that guarantees passive fit for multiple implants and most predictable implant prosthesis restoration process.

In implant rehabilitations, the difficulty of taking a precise impression increases with the number of implants to be captured and their angulations. 

3D printers and scanners have accuracy limitations and each step depends on the previous one so passive fit is a really complex process: there's no guarantee of matching the patient's implants.

PIC dental introduces a solution that’s always reliable and precise in all multiple implant cases regardless of the user, patient, technique or implant’s number or distribution, as demonstrated in thousands of successful clinical cases.

The system is based on the PIC camera, a high precision stereo camera that allows to take an impression with a simple capture protocol in less than 1 minute thanks to the PIC abutments, impression transfers calibrated with digital 3D codes that are easily screwed to the patient’s implants.

The PIC camera has to be approached to the oral cavity and the PIC abutments positions are identified and their relative distances and angles are measured.

The results are immediately exported to a PIC file that contains the exact positions, angles and interrelated distances between the implant platforms.

Soft tissue registration must be taken with an alginate impression or an intraoral scanner.

At the lab, PIC file and soft tissue data are easily aligned becoming a high-precision digital model identical to the patient’s mouth.

Now you are ready to continue your digital CAD/CAM or conventional workflow.

To learn more about how to get reliable and precise implant impressions, contact us info@picdental.com

resumen:
LetMeShip is Europe's first independent multi-carrier shipping software solution provider for express and parcel services. 

Founded in 2000, LetMeShip is providing business customers the possibility to optimize their shipments with different parcel and express operators. The application allows customers to compare prices and services of the major carriers (such as DHL, TNT, UPS, etc.) and provides them with a simplified and centralized booking process. 

The solution is offered in Germany, Austria, Switzerland, France, the Netherlands, Belgium, Hong Kong and Spain. 

With more than 30 shipping providers and freight forwarders, the booking platform LetMeShip offers all customers flexible and independent shipping processes at attractive conditions, without any binding contract or monthly fee. All involved service providers such as DHL, DPD, UPS, Hermes, TNT, but also freight forwarders and special service providers like Hellmann, OBC, inTime, Sitra and many more can be compared on the platform, booked or paid. 
Additionally, every customer will get; a single invoice for all type of shipments organized via the LetMeShip platform (regardless of which carrier has been used), an archive providing all historical booking data, including a one-click tracking and tracing of each shipment.

Customers with regular shipping volumes and own framework contracts can use LetMeShip Solutions with individual multi-carrier shipping systems and software. 
The three modules Office, Cloud and Warehouse are all independent of place, type and provider of the shipping, and can be combined according to customer requirements. LetMeShip Solutions therefore provides process and cost-effective shipping along the customes’ supply chains.
especialidad: multi carrier shipping, shipping software, versandsoftware y Versandschnittstelle
sector: Transporte, logística, cadena de suministro y almacenamiento

resumen: Deerns est un bureau d’études international et indépendant, spécialisé dans l’ingénierie de fluides, dans la stratégie environnementale et énergétique, dans la performance durable des bâtiments, ainsi que dans la conception de systèmes intelligents et communicants. Fort de ses 500 collaborateurs à haute compétence technique, Deerns fournit des services d’ingénierie avec une approche intégrée, allant de la conception de systèmes mécaniques, électriques et hydrauliques, de réseaux et installations intelligentes, de transport vertical, d'ingénierie des façades, de santé et sécurité du cadre bâti, jusqu'au contrôle et commande de systèmes, et à l'accompagnement aux certifications de bâtiments (HQE, BREEAM, LEED, WELL, Effinergie, R2S, WiredScore).
